summary: This statement to two House Veterans' Affairs subcommittees summarizes our analysis of VA's contracting for professional services. For example, we analyzed data that showed VA obligated almost $3 billion in fiscal year 2022 to 1,400 vendors of professional, administrative, and management services. We also summarized federal regulations related to conflicts of interest. For example, federal regulations require that, among other things, contracting officers avoid significant...
title: Veterans Affairs: Information on Professional Services Contracting Data and Conflict of Interest Regulations
